poems.poem: i am a women and a poem
poems.author: Nayyirah Waheed

poems.poem: some words build houses in your throat. and they live there. content and on fire
poems.author: Nayyirah Waheed

poems.poem: my ancestors made sure i was born the color of their eyes
poems.author: Nayyirah Waheed

poems.poem: she is poem country everywhere a language
poems.author: Nayyirah Waheed
